pkgmetadata.longdescription: pybroom=======**Pybroom** is a small python 3+ library for converting collections offit results (curve fitting or other optimizations)to `Pandas <http://pandas.pydata.org/>`__`DataFrame <http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/dsintro.html#dataframe>`__in tidy format (or long-form)`(Wickham 2014) <http://dx.doi.org/10.18637/jss.v059.i10>`__.Once fit results are in tidy DataFrames, it is possible to leverage`common patterns <http://tomaugspurger.github.io/modern-5-tidy.html>`__for tidy data analysis. Furthermore powerful visualexplorations using multi-facet plots becomes easy thanks to librarieslike `seaborn <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/seaborn/>`__ nativelysupporting tidy DataFrames.See the `pybroom homepage <http://pybroom.readthedocs.io/>`__ for more info.
